body_html: That's still quite long. We probably don't need data generation and all that. Just replace it with torch.randn and similar. It'd be the best if you could manage to compress the script into 30-40 lines.

body: That's still quite long. We probably don't need data generation and all that. Just replace it with `torch.randn` and similar. It'd be the best if you could manage to compress the script into 30-40 lines.
